"subject": { "id": 4, "name": "Литература" }, "teacher": 4 }, "grade": 5, "student": 3 }, { "id": 18, "lesson": { "id": 49, "class_id": { "id": 2, "teacher": { "id": 2, "first_name": "Иван", "middle_name": "Сергеевич", "last_name": "Смирнов", "room": 2 }, "number": 10, "letter": "b" }, "subject": { "id": 5, "name": "Физика" }, "teacher": 5 }, "grade": 5, "student": 3 }, { "id": 19, "lesson": { "id": 50, "class_id": { "id": 2, "teacher": { "id": 2, "first_name": "Иван", "middle_name": "Сергеевич", "last_name": "Смирнов", "room": 2 }, "number": 10, "letter": "b" }, "subject": { "id": 6, "name": "История" }, "teacher": 6 }, "grade": 4, "student": 3 } ] Teacher schedule URL : /api/teacher-schedule/1/ Usage examples Request GET : { } Response [ { "id": 1, "date": "2024-04-09", "lesson_number": 1, "room": 1, "course": 39 }, { "id": 4, "date": "2024-04-09", "lesson_number": 2, "room": 1, "course": 45 }, { "id": 5, "date": "2024-04-09", "lesson_number": 3, "room": 1, "course": 51 } ] Class by teacher URL : /api/teacher-class/1/ Usage examples Request GET : { } Response { "id": 1, "teacher": { "id": 1, "first_name": "Андрей", "middle_name": "Сергеевич", "last_name": "Захаров", "room": 1 }, "number": 10, "letter": "a" } Class report URL : /api/class-report/ / Usage examples Request GET : { } Response { "class_name": "10b", "total_students": 2, "class_teacher": "Иван Смирнов", "subject_average_grade": { "Физкультура": 4.5, "Математика": 4.0, "Русский язык": 4.0, "Литература": 5.0, "Физика": 5.0, "История": 4.5 } } Count room per discipline type URL : /api/count-rooms-per-discipline-type/ Usage examples Request GET : { } Response { "basic_rooms_count": 7, "profile_rooms_count": 0 } Gender counts per class URL : /api/gender-counts-per-class/1/ Usage examples Request GET : { } Response { "Male": 1, "Female": 1 } Count teachers per discipline URL : /api/count-teachers-per-discipline/ Usage examples Request GET : { } Response { "Физкультура": 1, "Математика": 1, "Русский язык": 1, "Литература": 1, "Физика": 1, "История": 1 }
